short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension prevents you from scrolling through youtube shorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just install this extension and it prevents you from scrolling through youtube shorts!
If you want to scroll, you have to uninstall the extension.
